name: Arcane Blademaster
description: A highly skilled humanoid adept at both martial combat and arcane spellcasting, wielding a longsword and dressed in heavy armor.
memorable: Excels in both melee and spellcasting, can create devastating area damage with spells like Meteor Swarm.
goals: To dominate the battlefield using a combination of weapon attacks and powerful spells.
relations: May serve as an elite enforcer for magical organizations or operate independently as a mercenary.
environment: Often found in battlegrounds or within mystical towers, typically in areas of great magical significance.
strengths: Possesses strong melee combat ability enhanced by the Duelist feature and effective spellcasting with high Intelligence.
weaknesses: Vulnerable to magical disruption due to reliance on spells and concentration.
attacks: Can attack with a longsword dealing slashing damage or a composite longbow for piercing damage, and has powerful spell attacks.
most_powerful_ability: Meteor Swarm, which deals massive area damage to multiple targets at once.
skills: Proficient in arcana and athletics, reflecting expertise in magic and physical prowess.
additional_information: Magic Resistance grants advantage on saving throws against spells.
Steel Focus gives advantage on concentration checks for spells.
Superior Heavy Armor Master reduces damage from nonmagical attacks.
Capable of executing a Multiattack for multiple strikes and cantrips in one turn.
Access to various powerful spells including globe of invulnerability and teleport.
spellcasting: 20th-level spellcaster with a variety of powerful spells from cantrips to Meteor Swarm.
